noot.ast
Class DeclarationNode

java.lang.Object
  org.antlr.runtime.tree.BaseTree
      org.antlr.runtime.tree.CommonTree
          noot.ast.Node
              noot.ast.DeclarationNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.antlr.runtime.tree.Tree
public class DeclarationNode
extends Node

The Class DeclarationNode. This node represents a declaration. It can be used to identify the type of associated IdentifierNodes. These Nodes can't be accessed through this object but this instances of DeclarationNode van be accessed through them. The DeclarationNode also contains information about the scoping level and if it represents a constant or not.

getDeclarationLevel

public int getDeclarationLevel()
Gets the declaration scoping level.

Returns:
the scoping level on which this declaration has been done

setDeclarationLevel

public void setDeclarationLevel(int declarationLevel)
Sets the declaration scoping level.

Parameters:

getIdentifierNode

public IdentifierNode getIdentifierNode()
Gets the associated identifier node used in the declaration. This should only be used for logging and debugging not for evaluation because other identifier nodes could be connected to this declaration.

Returns:
the identifier node

getDeclaredType

public Node.NodeType getDeclaredType()
Gets the declared type. Use this method to get the type of associated IdentifierNodes.

Returns:
the declared type

isConstant

public boolean isConstant()
Checks if this declaration represents a constant.

Returns:
true, if is this declaration is a constant false if it is a variable

setConstant

public void setConstant(boolean constant)
Sets the if this declaration is a constant.

Parameters:
constant - true if declaration is a constant false if it is a variable
